channel.title: SIPGo – Financial Calculators & Tools
channel.description: Explore SIPGo’s suite of financial calculators for smart investing, saving, and planning.

item.title: SIPGo – Home
item.description: Welcome to SIPGo – Smart investment and savings tools for everyone.

item.title: SIP Calculator
item.description: Plan your SIP investments with our easy-to-use SIP calculator.

item.title: Lumpsum Calculator
item.description: Calculate your returns on one-time investments with our lumpsum calculator.

item.title: Step-Up SIP Calculator
item.description: Estimate returns on step-up SIP investments with our calculator.

item.title: SWP Calculator
item.description: Calculate your Systematic Withdrawal Plan (SWP) returns.

item.title: EMI Calculator
item.description: Calculate monthly EMIs for personal, car, or home loans.

item.title: PPF Calculator
item.description: Estimate your returns from Public Provident Fund (PPF) contributions.

item.title: Fixed Deposit Calculator
item.description: Calculate maturity amounts and interest for fixed deposits.

item.title: RD Calculator
item.description: Calculate returns on recurring deposits with our RD calculator.

item.title: KVP Calculator
item.description: Estimate returns on Kisan Vikas Patra investments.
